attributes.action: Lessen the tax for the middle class, we are now bearing such a burden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony, holiday at home, pay for your children's education and also hols/work experience. The same with all labour  - don't try to have a rule for the party and not for the people.
Where has all the taxation money gone? The NHS computers have cost billions and are unreliable, transits systems unreliable, education unreliable, foreign affairs unreliable, hopefully the labour ministers are somewhere charging the tax payers and are relaxing and enjoying the sunshine. Tried to select Honesty but doesnt feature!!!!!!!!!!
